title: Tool Bar missing
content: I have lost the toolbar on the new messages page. The toolbar that allows you to change fonts, resize, bold, italics, underline, and more. I have looked for hours to find out how to restore this toolbar. Can anyone help me?
creator: Bigfoot14

title: Login failed
content:
I have 4 mail accounts with the same mail provider and I use Thunderbird to access them. Since a few days I get a login failure for one of the accounts. The other 3 work fine. I have not changed anything myself. The error message reads: "Login to server mailin.telia.com with username santamonica@telia.com failed." Below that message there are 3 options; "Retry" "Enter New Password" "Cancel". Retry doesn´t work and when I click on "Enter New Password" I get a frame with the following message: "Enter your password fpr santamonica@telia.com on mailin.telia.com". I enter my password but it still doesn´t work, I only get the initial error message again.

I have talked to the mail provider and they say that they can´t help with this since the fault is with Thunderbird.

Does anyone have a clue as to what could be wrong, and what I could do to correct this matter?
creator: santamonica1

title: Can not add an extra e-mail address
content:
I have a new laptop "YOGA" with W11. Now I want to add an extra e-mail address. I am in Sweden and now I want to add my Spanish e-mail. It is a " @telefonica.net" address. I only want it to receive mail, to send mail I use my ordinary swedish mail. When I put in the "@telefonica.net" Thunderbird will not respond it says "use only letters and figures etc"

How can I fix this?
creator: Stenteg

title: Pridávanie emailového účtu
content:
Dobrý deň, mám dlhodobo problém s pridávaním nového emailu v thunderbirde. Pri nástupe nového zamestnanca vždy vytvorím nový email cez websupport, a následne email pridám do aplikácie thunderbirdu v počítači. Vždy to išlo bez problémov, ale teraz keď sa pokúšam pridať nový email, zadám názov a adresu, prebieha konfigurácia a ďalej nič nenačíta. Nechala som to konfigurovať aj hodinu, ale nič sa nestalo. Aktualizácia thunderbirdu je aktuálna.

Vopred ďakujem za odpoveď.

Štrbová
creator: strbova

title: Thunderbird email default layout
content: Good morning Is there a way to set up my own preferred default column layout to one that suits me I have 40+ folders and changing every one on new install and when updates are issued is a real pain I am on release 143.0.1 (64-bit) Many thanks John
creator: john.puncher
